title: Alpha client
body: Just got accepted on alpha client, can someone explain me what alpha is and how dose it work? Am I 1 step closer to the PBE?

replies.body:
The Alpha Client is the new client that we're testing to eventually replace the current client, which we refer to as the *Air Client* since it runs on Adobe Air. It's not connected to the PBE in any way. You'll be able to test the new client with your regular account you sign in with now. You can find out complete information on this client in our [Alpha Client FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/206201070-Alpha-Client-FAQ).

Let me know if you have any questions.
The alpha client is the new client Riot is making for the game. Completely detached from PBE access. http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update
